attributes.gcd: Refers to the date as on which the snapshot of source data extracted for processing.

Flag Indicates if asset is controlled by treasury or not. The stock should be under the control of the function charged with managing the liquidity of the bank, e.g. the treasurer, meaning the function has the continuous authority, and legal and operational capability, to monetize any asset in the stock.

Refers to the source system from where data is extracted. Data can be sourced from multiple sources, this column will Refers to the source code from where the data is extracted for this extraction date.

Refers to end of period balance which includes accrued interest. All the calculations such as interest, prepayment amounts etc. are based on this amount. This is used in all the calculations performed by cash flow engine. In Case of LC Contracts, EOP Balance should be populated when LC Is executed. Till LC is executed, LC amount sanctioned should be hold in Total Commitment Amount.
Refers to the Balance Change Amount for every forward date, which is applicable for Balance Change Download Method.

Refers to the forecast dates for which the aggregate cash flows are given .Aggregation is at Product, Currency and Legal Entity Level. This attribute also holds the forecast date for which the liquidity balances, net exposures and for the run like, 9 quarter end and 5 year end date from the Run date are provided .
Refers to the Balance at the end of Forecast Period, this is used in Equally changing Balance Forecast Method.
Refers to the forecast period, this data will be used in balance forecast methods specifically in Equally Changing Balance.

attributes.logicalName: Forecast Threshold End of Period Balance
attributes.gcd: Refers to the threshold for EOP Balance. If the amount is given in this column, the forecasting balance methods should refer this as threshold balance.

ISO currency codes is a standard published by the International Organization for Standardization 4217, which delineates currency designators and country codes, alpha and numeric. This column will capture the standardized currency code. Currency dimension is the equivalent dimension table for this column.
Refers to the entity code of the legal entity to which the account will be attributed in the general ledger.

Flag indicates the transferability restriction. Sometimes, due to regulatory rules or other market conditions, excess liquidity available in a given legal entity is Trapped i.e. it is not available for use at the parent entity or the consolidated. List of values are Y, N.
Refers to the unique code assigned to each of the Products offered by the Bank.
Refers to the record creation date. It has been added to all catalog entities to enable partitioning and archival.
Refers to the run identifier for a set of Records participating in the particular Run with the Run Execution identifier. This is a combination of Run Main Identifier and Run Execution Identifier.

governance.dqDesc: Should have list of values as N,Y
governance.dqType: List of Values or Code Check

governance.dqDesc: Should have list of values as N,Y
governance.dqType: List of Values or Code Check

governance.dqDesc: Reference Check for As Of Date in Stage Forecast Liquidity Balances

Reference Check for Forecast Date in Stage Forecast Liquidity Balances
